title: Private Lessons {1981 VHS uncensored version}
description:
This is a *VHS* conversion. The VHS version is the only version with uncensored nudity and the infamous strip scene with Slyvia Kristel. The DVD version was released with major cuts and edits that you would not find in the VHS version. I bought a VHS conversion kit and painfully did my best to encode this great film into a digitized format for all to enjoy.
Please be aware that this is a VHS conversion and the quality will not be like a BRRIP! I hope you all enjoy what should have been released onto the DVD but was not.
As always,if the upload is slow or nonexistant.

Storyline

Phillip Filmore is a naive, 15-year-old, preoccupied with sex, who develops a crush on Nicole Mallow, the new 30-something, French housekeeper and sitter to look after him when Phillip's father is out of town for the summer on a "business" trip. But Mr. Filmore's unscrupulous chauffeur, Lester Lewis, takes advantage of Phillip's crush on Nicole to hire her to seduce the youth, then draws her into a plot to fake her own death in a blackmail scheme aimed to drain Phillip's trust fund.
